# Archive - Historical Documentation

This folder contains historical migration guides and documentation from past refactoring efforts.

These documents are preserved for reference but are no longer actively maintained.

## Archived Documents

| Document | Description | Status |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| `CENTRALIZED_SERVICES_MIGRATION.md` | Migration guide for services adopting UCS | Complete |
| `CLIENTS_DEPRECATION_GUIDE.md` | Guide for deprecated client patterns | Complete |
| `CLIENTS_DEPRECATION_IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md` | Implementation summary | Complete |
| `FACTORY_FUNCTIONS_REMOVAL.md` | Factory function removal docs | Complete |
| `UNIFIED_CLOUD_SERVICES_REFACTOR_SUMMARY.md` | Refactoring history | Complete |

## Current Documentation

For current documentation, see:
- **[../README.md](../README.md)** - Main documentation and setup guide
- **[../PATTERNS.md](../PATTERNS.md)** - Usage patterns and best practices
- **[../DEV_SETUP.md](../DEV_SETUP.md)** - Development environment setup
